I been playing CSGO for years and I believe it is a great game to be played. The beginning of playing was really amazing for me because it was my first fps game and that is when I fell in love with CSGO. Times may get hard and stressful in games but the feeling for when you pop off and have the spotlight on you for just a moment, that's when you'll fall in love too.
